org.gridlab.gat.io
Class FileOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.OutputStream
        |
        +--org.gridlab.gat.io.FileOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Monitorable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileOutputStreamCpi
public abstract class FileOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
implements Monitorable

A FileStream represents a connection to open file, the file may be either remote or local.

FileOutputStream

protected FileOutputStream(GATContext gatContext,
                           Preferences preferences,
                           File file,
                           boolean append)
                    throws java.io.IOException
This creates a FileStream attached to the physical file at the specified Location.

Parameters:
gatContext - The GATContext used to broker resources
preferences - The Preferences for this instance
file - the file to get the stream from.
append - append to the file or overwrite it
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown upon creation error of some sort
